channel.title: Product Management Playbook on Product Manager Playbook
channel.description: Recent content in Product Management Playbook on Product Manager Playbook

item.title: Case Study Template
item.description: A structured template for documenting real product case studies, covering context, problems, constraints, decisions, delivery, and outcomes.

item.title: Decision-Making Framework
item.description: Frameworks to support structured and transparent decision-making in product management, helping teams evaluate options, trade-offs, and risks.

item.title: North Star Metric
item.description: A template to define and document a clear North Star Metric that aligns product teams around long-term user and business value.

item.title: Problem Statement
item.description: A template to clearly define and align on the user problem, its context, impact, and why it is worth solving.

item.title: Product Requirements Document (PRD)
item.description: A structured template to document product requirements, aligning business goals, user needs, constraints, and delivery teams.

item.title: Product Vision
item.description: A template to define and communicate a clear product vision that aligns teams and stakeholders around long-term direction and purpose.

item.title: Backlog Refinement
item.description: A template to support effective backlog refinement, ensuring clarity, prioritization, and readiness of product work.

item.title: Discovery Framework
item.description: Frameworks that guide product discovery activities, from understanding user problems to validating assumptions and shaping solutions.

item.title: Natural Capital
item.description: SaaS Platform for Green Deal Clients.

item.title: OKRs
item.description: A structured template for defining Objectives and Key Results, helping product teams align goals, outcomes, and execution.

item.title: Product Strategy
item.description: A structured template to define product strategy, aligning vision, goals, target users, value propositions, and strategic choices.

item.title: User Persona
item.description: A template to capture key user characteristics, needs, motivations, and behaviors to inform product discovery and decisions.

item.title: KPIs
item.description: A template to define and track Key Performance Indicators that measure product performance, health, and impact over time.

item.title: Prioritization Framework
item.description: Frameworks to help Product Managers prioritize initiatives, features, and opportunities based on impact, effort, risk, and strategic alignment.

item.title: Product Principles
item.description: A template to define product principles that guide decision-making, trade-offs, and consistent product behavior over time.

item.title: SIRVEC
item.description: Evidence Tracking & Chain of Custody Platform.

item.title: Sprint Goal
item.description: A template to define clear and outcome-oriented sprint goals that align team efforts and focus delivery.

item.title: User Interview
item.description: A structured guide to plan and run user interviews, helping teams gather qualitative insights and validate assumptions.

item.title: Assumption Mapping
item.description: A template to identify, categorize, and prioritize assumptions based on risk and uncertainty.

item.title: Experiment Metrics
item.description: A template to define success metrics for product experiments, enabling teams to evaluate hypotheses and learning outcomes.

item.title: Problem Framing Framework
item.description: Frameworks for clearly defining, framing, and communicating product problems before jumping to solutions.

item.title: Product Roadmap
item.description: A template to create outcome-oriented product roadmaps that align strategy, priorities, and delivery over time.

item.title: Release Plan
item.description: A template to plan and communicate product releases, aligning scope, timing, risks, and stakeholders.

item.title: Opportunity Solution Tree
item.description: A template to visualize opportunities, solutions, and experiments, connecting user problems to outcomes.

item.title: Prioritization
item.description: A template to evaluate and prioritize product initiatives using clear criteria, trade-offs, and strategic alignment.

item.title: Product Strategy Framework
item.description: Frameworks that support long-term product strategy, aligning vision, goals, customer value, and business outcomes.

item.title: Retrospective
item.description: A structured template for running retrospectives that support continuous improvement, learning, and team alignment.

item.title: Hypothesis Statement
item.description: A template to formulate clear, testable hypotheses that link assumptions to expected outcomes.

item.title: Experiment Plan
item.description: A template to design discovery experiments, defining goals, methods, success metrics, and risks.

item.title: Discovery Summary
item.description: A template to synthesize discovery insights, learnings, decisions, and next steps.

item.title: Analytics Tools
item.description: Tools for product analytics, experimentation, and data-informed decision-making.

item.title: Articles & Blogs
item.description: A curated selection of articles and blogs covering product management, discovery, strategy, delivery, leadership, and industry trends.

item.title: Books
item.description: Essential books for Product Managers, covering product discovery, strategy, leadership, systems thinking, and modern product practices.
